p: ‘Gannanzao’ oranges were picked in October, 2017, from the germplasm resources of Gannan Normal University, Ganzhou City of Jiangxi Province, China (25°48′ N, 114°52′ E). Oranges were peeled by hand, separating the external part of the orange (flavedo), giving a yield of 20% ( w/ w) of orange peel with respect to the whole fruit. The fresh flavedo was crushed and used immediately as a sample in all extractions.
